item.name: Calendula Cleanser 100g
item.description:
This gentle and mild cleansing cream washes away make-up and everyday impurities to leave your face feeling fresh and clean. Ideal for dry and sensitive skin types, the blend of organic calendula and jojoba is enriched with natural skin-conditioning botanical oils to soften and soothe.

  • Gently cleanses with skin conditioning botanical oils

item.name: Frankincense Intense Cleansing Melt 100ml
item.description:
Discover visibly smoother, softer skin every time you cleanse with our Frankincense Intense™ Cleansing Melt.

Complete your Frankincense Intense™ beauty routine with our luxurious triple-textured cleanser. Specially formulated to melt away everyday impurities, including long wear and waterproof make-up, our certified organic cleanser will leave skin feeling smooth, soft and renewed.

Cleanses
A micro-emulsion of natural sugars and oils bind with water to give a triple-texture effect, melting away even waterproof make-up, for skin that feels intensely cleansed, without drying.

Renews
A luxurious blend of organic sunflower, sweet almond and refined coconut oils combine to help
trap moisture within the skin’s surface to leave skin feeling soft, supple and renewed.

Enhances wellbeing
Soothes your senses with our Boswellia sacra (frankincense) essential oil, treasured for centuries for its deeply relaxing aroma.

PROOF ORGANIC WORKS
Clinically proven to moisturise skin for up to 12 hours.

After first use*
85% agree their skin feels renewed
91% agree their skin feels softer

After 2 weeks*
86% agree their skin looks smoother
91% agree their skin feels nourished

*Based on a consumer trial with 67 women

Frankincense Intense™ mindful cleansing ritual
Create a moment of mindfulness in six simple steps every morning and evening.

  1. Warm a small amount of cleansing melt in the palm of your hand.
  2. Close your eyes and inhale the therapeutic aroma for a few moments.
  3. Massage into dry skin using an upwards and outwards circular motion, taking care around the delicate eye area.
  4. Continue to massage until the rich cleansing gel melts into a skin-conditioning oil.
  5. Apply warm water to your face to transform the oil into a creamy milk emulsion.
  6. Rinse with warm water until skin is clean and pat dry.
item.summary: Discover visibly smoother, softer skin every time you cleanse with our Frankincense Intense™ Cleansing Melt. Complete your Frankincense Intense™ beauty routine with our luxurious triple-textured cleanser. Specially formulated to melt away everyday impurities, including long wear and waterproof make-up, our certified organic cleanser will leave skin feeling smooth, soft and...

item.name: Frankincense Hydrating Essence 100ml
item.description:
Visibly smooth, condition and refine with a luxurious veil of hydration to enhance your beauty routine. This feather-light essence hydrates and prepares skin to improve the performance of the products that follow. With a moisture-boosting blend of hyaluronic acid, purified pomegranate extract and organic argan oil, over time skin looks healthier, brighter and more refined.

Clinically proven to hydrate skin for up to 24 hours, and to improve the performance of your Frankincense Intense™ Age-Defying or Lift Serum, it’s the perfect partner to enhance your Frankincense Intense™ beauty routine.

Improves performance
Purified pomegranate extract helps to restore the natural flow of water in the skin, prepping
it perfectly to better absorb serums and moisturisers, improving their performance.

Conditions
A skin-conditioning combination of hydrating hyaluronic acid and organic argan oil plumps, nourishes and helps to strengthen skin, to leave it feeling soft, smooth and radiant.

Enhances wellbeing
Soothes your senses with our Boswellia sacra (frankincense) essential oil, treasured for centuries for its deeply relaxing aroma.

PROOF ORGANIC WORKS
Clinically proven to hydrate skin for up to 24 hours.

After 1 week*
80% agree their skin looks smoother
75% agree their natural glow is restored

After 2 weeks*
80% agree the appearance of skin is improved
80% agree their skin looks brighter
71% agree their complexion is refined

EVEN BETTER TOGETHER
When using Frankincense Intense™ Hydrating Essence as part of your Frankincense Intense™ skincare routine.

Target fine lines and wrinkles†
95% agree their skin looks smoother
87% agree their fine lines and wrinkles are visibly reduced

Target deep lines and loss of firmness††
90% agree their skin looks smoother
88% agree their skin feel firmer and recontoured

*Based on a consumer trial with 100 women

†When using Frankincense Intense™ Hydrating Essence and Frankincense Intense™ Age-Defying Serum together. Based on a consumer trial with 65 women after 4 weeks.

††When using Frankincense Intense™ Hydrating Essence and Frankincense Intense™ Lift Serum together. Based on a consumer trial with 60 women after 4 weeks.

 

“I like the silky feel on my skin and the gorgeous fragrance. It makes my skin feel supple and alive.”
Sara, consumer trial participant for Frankincense Intense™ Hydrating Essence
